mapper.insert: INSERT INTO goods (name, picture, price, intro, tid_1, tid_2, tid_3) VALUES (#{name},#{picture},#{price},#{intro},#{tid_1},#{tid_2},#{tid_3})
mapper.select: SELECT g.gid,g.name,g.price,g.picture,g.intro,g.tid_1,g.tid_2,g.tid_3, e.star,e.point,e.sales_volume,e.total_collection,e.total_comment FROM goods AS g INNER JOIN goods_evaluate AS e ON g.gid = e.gid WHERE g.gid = #{gid} AND status=1
SELECT gid,name,picture,price,intro,tid_1,tid_2,tid_3 FROM goods WHERE name LIKE #{name} AND status=1
SELECT gid, name, picture, price, intro, tid_1, tid_2, tid_3 FROM goods WHERE gid=#{gid} AND status=1
